resources.string: FILL IN ALL FIELDS TO CALCULATE THE CAPACITANCE NEEDED TO CORRECT THE POWER FACTOR TO UNITY(1)
All fields must be filled in to calculate the Capacitance.
Power factor must be between 0 and 1

This app calculates the capacitance required to correct a given power factor to unity (1) or to a point below unity .All fields are required to be filled in. The power should be inputted in kilowatts and the power factor must be between 0 and 1.This app can also be used to calculate power factor given the apparent power and the true power. If you have any questions or issues with this app you may contact me at alexis.o.simpson@gmail.com
FILL IN ALL FIELDS TO CALCULATE THE CAPACITANCE NEEDED TO CORRECT THE POWER FACTOR TO UNITY(1) OR BELOW UNITY
FILL IN ANY TWO VALUES TO CALCULATE THE THIRD VALUE
Fill in two of three textBoxes
Power factor must be less than 1 or equal to 1
Apparent power must be greater than true power
It\'s expected that you want to improve your existing power factor; hence your existing power factor is must be lower than the power factor you require
